scripts.pretest: if exist cypress\reports; then rmdir /S/Q cypress\reports; fi;
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:school_api: cypress open --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:staging:lo: cypress open --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:gui:stable:pr:school_api_test:local: cypress open --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:pr:staging:local: cypress open --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:schoo: cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:stagi: cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@regression_test and @stable_test and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:headless:stable:pr:school_api_test:lo: cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:headless:stable:pr:staging:local: cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@pr and @stable_test and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:school_api: xvfb-run cypress open --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=ci
scripts.cy:headless:stable:schedule_run:school_a: xvfb-run cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @school_api_test and @schedule_run",environmentName=ci,parallelGroup=scheduled
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:schoo: xvfb-run cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=ci,parallelGroup=automatic
scripts.cy:headless:stable:pr:school_api_test:ci: xvfb-run cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@pr and @stable_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=ci
scripts.cy:headless:stable:groupA:school_api_tes: xvfb-run cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@group-A and @stable_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=ci,parallelGroup=group-A
scripts.cy:headless:stable:groupB:school_api_tes: xvfb-run cypress run --browser edge -e tags="@group-B and @stable_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=ci,parallelGroup=group-B
